message.content:
1. The statement is discussing postoperative length of stay.
2. The median postoperative length of stay is 9 days.
3. The interquartile range (IQR) of the postoperative length of stay is 7 to 14 days.
4. The lower quartile of the postoperative length of stay is 7 days.
5. The upper quartile of the postoperative length of stay is 14 days.

messages.content:
Statement: The ^median of postoperative length of stay was 9 days (IQR 7–14 day).
